html:
5.29.24  9:41 am   bill i think the world needs more of your songs now more than ever. what say you?

      whether they do or not, i need to make them

5.29.24  9:39 am   do you like to go for walks? 

      yes

5.29.24  7:18 am   I really want to be an engineer, but I feel like I'm just too dumb when it comes to math despite being pretty alright at it. Any advice to not feel this way?

      i wonder what it would take to solve problems that intrigue you, in your own way

5.29.24  6:00 am   favorite chord?

      F

5.29.24  4:21 am   one thing that stops me from making art is; if i make art that is genuine to myself, and people hate or ignore it, i fear it is because i'm "bad" and worthy of their execration or ignorance. do you ever feel afraid to make your art? and how do you push through that?

      a weird trick here is to make it even MORE genuine to yourself. it's possible that in your doubt, you never actually had the guts to take it all the way in the first place

5.29.24  3:42 am   tips and tricks for getting out of bed,  ?

      try the front door, of the bed

5.29.24  1:54 am   for the bass on 'Hallelujah,' how did you get the pitch bending so good? Is it a monophonic synth with portamento? and did you do some parts with pitch wheel and other parts portamento? Like specifically just before the F# minor in the last chorus, the bass ditches the bass line and plays 'hallelujah' in parallel with the vocals, and the notes sound kind of trilled/blurred together. The the bass just goes off for the last 10 seconds and i can't exactly tell what it's doing, except i hear it hit a D# and maybe outline a C fully diminished to resolve to the A/E, but the notes don't sound totally articulated or totally portamento'd. How on earth did you get it to sound so expressive?

      i no longer remember, but really let's be honest, i didn't know then either. music is magic, especially for the one who is making it

5.29.24  1:01 am   For all my intelligence, I am an idiot. Do you know what I mean, Bill?

      sure

5.29.24  12:30 am   If you live to 90, and suddenly stop aging, how many years do you think it would take for you to notice that this was happening?

      26

5.28.24  11:48 pm   what's the shallowest deep thought you've ever had

      "i don't know"

5.28.24  11:20 pm   how talented do you think you are in music theory?

      enough for that question not to make one bit of sense anymore

5.28.24  10:41 pm   are you proud of how far you have come

      yes

5.28.24  8:18 pm   do you subscribe to a theory of everything

      it can be fun to pretend that's possible, for fleeting moments

5.28.24  8:07 pm   is it weird to be absurdly normal?

      let me perform some calculations

5.28.24  7:57 pm   you say that numbers are 'quantitative values (usually)'. When are they not quantitative?

      the reason the 'usually' was thrown in there is because i could just imagine some math expert coming out of the underbrush and claiming 'actually,....' probably something to do with imaginary numbers. who knows, mathematics is a broad field, and i just thought against underestimating it, in that moment

5.28.24  7:24 pm   is all digital art pixel art?

      i don't think so

5.28.24  6:46 pm   Are you a sentimental person?

      no, but i am indeed a person with a lot of sentiment

5.28.24  6:21 pm   I just feel like im stuck in a monotonous grind nowadays. I gotta keep up the a+ grind while also being with my friends and it just feels unsustainable. Is there any compromise or method to balance it out?

      sure. how about some sick art

5.28.24  3:45 pm   what do i do if sick but still want to make art

      sick art, of course

5.28.24  3:27 pm   What are examples of really good albums in your opinion and why

      i assumed there were some, but i checked out everyone else's favorites and i liked them much much less than any of the songs individually. now i'm not sure what to do

5.28.24  2:41 pm   i just realized i can work on 2 projects at once if i do it a certain way. this is revolutionary

      i see what you're saying

5.28.24  2:27 pm   what if "what if" questions didn't exist?

      then you wouldn't have asked this would you

5.28.24  1:44 pm   Which really came first, the chicken or the egg?

      neither one is here yet

5.28.24  1:06 pm   Some people have told me the meaning of life is being responsible. But what does that actually mean? To work a "real" job, to stay out of trouble, to practice religion, to stay healthy, to start a family, to spend time with good friends, to own a house or an apartment full of nice things, to die forgotten, to do what everybody else does? But there's got to be more to life than just the system! But what?

      you just made a long list of things that sound like they came from a postcard. they don't resemble the life of anyone i know of. what confuses things even more is, i can't find any connection between that list, and your first 2 sentences

5.28.24  11:51 am   thoughts on the scale D Eb F# G A Bb C# D?

      that seems quite useful

5.28.24  11:27 am   Hey, do you know what you're doing?

      not entirely

5.28.24  11:18 am   are you jaded

      not yet

5.28.24  10:58 am   Is it kind of cool that the human requirement for periodic sleep lines up perfectly with the fact that the Earth's lighting cycles between bright and dark, allowing the sleep to occur when the Earth is darker?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.28.24  9:33 am   If you could be anywhere, would you?

      sure

5.28.24  9:15 am   is anything actually stopping me from becoming a jedi

      mostly just all the paperwork

5.28.24  8:25 am   id like to draw you but im unsure how to since im deathly afraid of getting something wrong in the stylization process. what is there to get wrong?

      you could accidentally draw abraham lincoln. that is a common mistake

5.28.24  6:11 am   thoughts on UFUs (Unidentified Flying UFOs)?

      that reminds me of the AM (ATM machine)

5.28.24  5:56 am   did any of your songs on youtube come from dreams? (if so, which ones? (optional addon question))

      the melody (with chords attached, of course) for the whole verse (title sections) of "it's the first day of school, (and i think i might quit)" came from a dream

5.28.24  5:05 am   Do you think of your pieces as periods of wakefulness or periods of dreaming

      have you ever done both at the same time

5.28.24  4:53 am   Your 20ish years of creative output seems to be pretty straight down the line consistent tone wise, even stuff you made (presumably) very young. Were there constraints you set from the start? Did you model anything after something else (loosely of course)? Did you just catch a wave at 15 or whatever and follow it to its utmost conclusion?

      am self. it's that simple. there's nothing i can really do about that

5.28.24  2:19 am   how to deal with mean people 

      in your case, you can just let them know you think they are mean, then move on to the next mean person

5.28.24  1:40 am   What's your opinion on people who are of the opinion that their opinion is infallible and obviously right?

      that's not necessarily a trait of the person entirely, that's just a scenario that can happen to anyone from time to time

5.28.24  1:08 am   Are you having fun, generally speaking?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.28.24  12:24 am   Are you nuts? 

      almost

5.28.24  12:22 am   do you ever wish to stop thinking for a while

      almost

5.27.24  11:48 pm   Do you think the writing or the recording phase is taking over now?

      i am currently in production

5.27.24  11:20 pm   is everything perfect?

      no

5.27.24  10:49 pm   Why is people?

      it's worth a try

5.27.24  9:53 pm   mr wurtz your music has always made me feel better about my current situation, but now I stand in a very rough spot and I would appreciate it a bunch if you could give me some advice on how to not feel like worthless garbage 24/7

      you'd have to give me more specific information about the problem. sometimes solutions to various problems can actually be so different that they may even be entirely opposites

5.27.24  9:31 pm   whats your love language

      time and space

5.27.24  9:28 pm   are you working on multiple individual parts of multiple videos at once switching between each part from time to time

      i have a system

5.27.24  8:56 pm   why do some people not make art

      maybe they just forgot to

5.27.24  8:11 pm   what is the objectively best cookie

      the one that improves the user experience

5.27.24  7:04 pm   How is your mental health? 

      extremelyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy good

5.27.24  6:49 pm   How do you breathe?

      this may be overdoing it, but how about going to sleep
